verses.verse: <S%G1487>If<s%> there be <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G3874>consolation<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G3890>comfort<s%> of <S%G26>love,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G4698>bowels<s%> and <S%G3628>mercies,<s%>

<S%G4137>Fulfill<s%> you my <S%G5479>joy,<s%> that you be like <S%G3588>minded,<s%> <S%G5426><s%> <S%G2192><s%> having the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> being of <S%G4861>one<s%> accord, of <S%G3888>one<s%> <S%G1520><s%> <S%G5426>mind.<s%>

Let <S%G3367>nothing<s%> be done <S%G2596>through<s%> <S%G2052>strife<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2754>vainglory;<s%> but in <S%G5012>lowliness<s%> of <S%G5012>mind<s%> let <S%G240>each<s%> <S%G2233>esteem<s%> <S%G240>other<s%> <S%G5242>better<s%> than <S%G1438>themselves.<s%>
<S%G4648>Look<s%> not <S%G1538>every<s%> man on his <S%G1438>own<s%> things, but <S%G1538>every<s%> man <S%G2532>also<s%> on the things of <S%G2087>others.<s%>
Let <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G5426>mind<s%> be in you, <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%>
Who, <S%G5225>being<s%> in the <S%G3444>form<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2233>thought<s%> it not <S%G725>robbery<s%> to be <S%G2470>equal<s%> with <S%G2316>God:<s%>

But <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> of <S%G5013>no<s%> <S%G2758>reputation,<s%> and <S%G2983>took<s%> on him the <S%G3444>form<s%> of a <S%G1401>servant,<s%> and was <S%G1096>made<s%> in the <S%G3667>likeness<s%> of <S%G444>men:<s%>

And being <S%G2147>found<s%> in <S%G4976>fashion<s%> as a <S%G444>man,<s%> he <S%G5013>humbled<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G5255>obedient<s%> to <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G1161>even<s%> the <S%G2288>death<s%> of the <S%G4716>cross.<s%>

<S%G1352>Why<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> has <S%G5251>highly<s%> <S%G5251>exalted<s%> him, and <S%G5483>given<s%> him a <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G5228>above<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3686>name:<s%>

That <S%G1722>at<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1119>knee<s%> should <S%G2578>bow,<s%> of things in <S%G2032>heaven,<s%> and things in <S%G1919>earth,<s%> and things <S%G2709>under<s%> the <S%G2709>earth;<s%>

And that <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%> should <S%G1843>confess<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> to the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father.<s%>

<S%G5620>Why,<s%> my <S%G27>beloved,<s%> as you have <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G5219>obeyed,<s%> not as in my <S%G3952>presence<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> in my <S%G666>absence,<s%> <S%G2716>work<s%> out <S%G1438>your<s%> <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> with <S%G5401>fear<s%> and <S%G5156>trembling.<s%>
For it is <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1754>works<s%> in you <S%G2532>both<s%> to <S%G2309>will<s%> and to <S%G1754>do<s%> of his good <S%G2107>pleasure.<s%>
<S%G4160>Do<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G1112>murmurings<s%> and <S%G1261>disputings:<s%>

That you may be <S%G273>blameless<s%> and <S%G185>harmless,<s%> the <S%G5043>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G298>without<s%> <S%G298>rebuke,<s%> in the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of a <S%G4646>crooked<s%> and <S%G1294>perverse<s%> <S%G1074>nation,<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G5316>shine<s%> as <S%G5458>lights<s%> in the <S%G2889>world;<s%>

<S%G1907>Holding<s%> <S%G1907>forth<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2222>life;<s%> that I may <S%G2745>rejoice<s%> in the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> that I have not <S%G5143>run<s%> in <S%G2756>vain,<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G2872>labored<s%> in <S%G2756>vain.<s%>

<S%G235>Yes,<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> I be <S%G4689>offered<s%> on the <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> and <S%G3009>service<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> I <S%G5463>joy,<s%> and <S%G4796>rejoice<s%> with you <S%G3956>all.<s%>
For the <S%G846>same<s%> cause <S%G2532>also<s%> do you <S%G5463>joy,<s%> and <S%G4796>rejoice<s%> with me.

But I <S%G1679>trust<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G5095>Timotheus<s%> <S%G5030>shortly<s%> to you, that I <S%G2504>also<s%> may be of good <S%G2174>comfort,<s%> when I <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3588>state.<s%> <S%G4012><s%>

For I <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> like <S%G2473>minded,<s%> <S%G3748>who<s%> will <S%G1104>naturally<s%> <S%G3309>care<s%> for <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3588>state.<s%> <S%G4012><s%>
For <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> their own, not the things which are <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ's.<s%>
But you <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G1382>proof<s%> of him, that, as a <S%G5043>son<s%> with the <S%G3962>father,<s%> he has <S%G1398>served<s%> with me in the <S%G2098>gospel.<s%>
Him <S%G3767>therefore<s%> I <S%G1679>hope<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G1824>presently,<s%> <S%G5613>so<s%> soon as I shall <S%G542>see<s%> <S%G4012>how<s%> it will go with me.
But I <S%G3982>trust<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> that I <S%G2532>also<s%> myself shall <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5030>shortly.<s%>

<S%G1161>Yet<s%> I <S%G2233>supposed<s%> it <S%G316>necessary<s%> to <S%G3992>send<s%> to you <S%G1891>Epaphroditus,<s%> my <S%G80>brother,<s%> and <S%G4904>companion<s%> in <S%G4904>labor,<s%> and fellow <S%G4961>soldier,<s%> but <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G652>messenger,<s%> and he that <S%G3011>ministered<s%> to my <S%G5532>wants.<s%>
For he <S%G1971>longed<s%> <S%G1971>after<s%> you <S%G3956>all,<s%> and was full of <S%G85>heaviness,<s%> <S%G1360>because<s%> that you had <S%G191>heard<s%> that he had been <S%G770>sick.<s%>

For <S%G2532>indeed<s%> he was <S%G770>sick<s%> <S%G3897>near<s%> to <S%G2288>death:<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> had <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on him; and not on him <S%G3440>only,<s%> but on me <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> I should <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3077>sorrow<s%> on <S%G3077>sorrow.<s%>

I <S%G3992>sent<s%> him <S%G3767>therefore<s%> the <S%G4708>more<s%> <S%G4708>carefully,<s%> that, when you <S%G1492>see<s%> him <S%G3825>again,<s%> you may <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> and that I may be the <S%G253>less<s%> <S%G253>sorrowful.<s%>
<S%G4327>Receive<s%> him <S%G3767>therefore<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5479>gladness;<s%> and <S%G2192>hold<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> in <S%G1784>reputation:<s%>

<S%G3754>Because<s%> for the <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> he was <S%G1448>near<s%> to <S%G2288>death,<s%> not <S%G3851>regarding<s%> his <S%G5590>life,<s%> to <S%G378>supply<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5303>lack<s%> of <S%G3009>service<s%> <S%G4314>toward<s%> me.
